ARABIC: فَلَمَّا جَآءَتْهُمْ ءَايَٰتُنَا مُبْصِرَةً قَالُوا۟ هَٰذَا سِحْرٌ مُّبِينٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: When Our Signs came to them in all their clarity, they said, 'This is downright magic,'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And when Our signs came as distinct proofs, they said: "This is only magic."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: But when Our Clear Signs came to them, they said: "This is plain magic."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: When Our miracles were visibly shown to them, they said, "It is plain magic".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Then when Our enlightening signs came to them, they said, “This is clear magic.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: But when Our Ayat came to them, clear to see, they said: "This is a manifest magic."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So when Our clear signs came to them, they said: This is clear enchantment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: But when Our signs came to them visibly, they said, 'This is a manifest sorcery';
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: But when Our tokens came unto them, plain to see, they said: This is mere magic,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But when Our signs came to them in all their clarity they said, "This is clearly sorcery!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then when Our signs came unto them illuminating, they said: this is a magic manifest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: But when Our signs came to them, as eye-openers, they said, ‘This is plain magic.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But when Our Signs came to them, that should have opened their eyes, they said: "This is sorcery manifest!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: But when Our Ayat (proofs, evidences, verses, lessons, signs, revelations, etc.) came to them, clear to see, they said: "This is a manifest magic."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But when Our signs came to them visibly, they said: 'This is plain sorcery.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Yet when Our enlightening signs came to them, they said, “This is obvious witchcraft.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But when there came to them Our visible signs, they said, "This is obvious magic."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [27:13] But when Our signs came to them plain to see, illuminating and clear, they said, ‘This is manifest sorcery’, clear and evident [sorcery].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (But when Our tokens came unto them) when Moses went with our tokens to them, (plain to see) demonstrating, one after the other, (they said: This is mere magic) what you have brought us, Moses, is a manifest lie,
